descriptionHtml:
Work in Progress
You can watch a preview here:
http://youtu.be/wTm4pHV_9us

Someone requested this so it can be tracked.
This mod will make use of the:

ENB v0.102 by Boris.
FXAA by some dude.

Im trying:
1st colors; photo realistic as possible.
2nd Light; as natural as possible (no more LED glowing faces, horsehair, flora ect.)
3rd Shadows; not overdone without the detail loss behind those shadows
4th Atmosphere; like Morrowind that was a bit more creepy grimmer, more celtic.
author: inot
